item.description:
Do you have trouble letting go of a past problem?

Would you like to learn a set of self-help tools that truly work, because they address what is actually happening in your body.  Get a healing, uplift your spirits and regain your hope? 

We are inviting you to an evening workshop of learning, healing and sharing.  Also I will try a new format where everyone will have an opportunity to receive a personal healing from me.

Come join us this coming Thursday and change your life for ever. 

You will learn three simple and profound energy restructuring steps that will remove the problem

  • from your body and your mind
  • your emotions and thoughts
  • your memories

and restore the energy flow in your body.

These steps will enable you to

  1. Retrieve the exiled part of your essence, that remains bound to the time/space of the problem/trauma
  2. Give back all the energy that is not you, send it back to its source.
  3. Recover all the energy lost to the experience and the suffering of living with the consequences of the problem/trauma.

You can apply these Energy Restructuring steps for

  • Processing traumatic event
  • Resolution of limiting beliefs
  • Relief of physical symptoms
  • Blocks in your career
  • Coping with losses and limitation
  • Relationship problems
  • Fears, addictions, compulsions and more..

 

Unfortunately millions of people have no choice but to try to live in various debilitating states of discomfort that results from energetic loss. You do not want to be one of them. I am inviting you to embark on an exciting journey to the new   trauma-free you. Let us get started. Join us for a highly experiential presentation, live demonstration and personal practices.

Warm welcome to everyone! I am looking forward to meeting all of you!

Schedule 7:00 Social time.

Meetup and introduction 7:15  – 9:30 Personal practice, teaching, live demonstration and sharing

group.name: Freedom from Fear/ Anxiety /Emotional Trauma Group

item.name: Three Simple and Powerful Steps to Effortless Healing
